quests.desc: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is your task for today. First of all, you could, like, make an effort to move north. With that over with, go to the east. Following that, pick-up the sponge from the floor of the washroom. Then, venture south. And then, toss the sponge on the floor of the study. And if you do that, you're the winner!

infos.name: study
infos.desc:
You've come into an ordinary room. Your mind races to think of what kind of room would be ordinary. And then it hits you. Of course. You're in the study. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great.

 You see a gleam over in a corner, where you can see a stand. The stand is standard.[if there is something on the s_0] On the stand you make out [a list of things on the s_0].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0] But oh no! there's nothing on this piece of garbage.[end if]

There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: laundromat
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a laundromat. A typical kind of place.



You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded.

infos.name: washroom
infos.desc:
You find yourself in a washroom. A normal one.

 You can make out a table. The table is usual.[if there is something on the s_1] On the table you make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1] The table appears to be empty. You swear loudly.[end if]

You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unguarded. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: chamber
infos.desc:
You arrive in a chamber. A typical one.

 You see a trunk. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[if c_0 is open and there is something in the c_0] The trunk contains [a list of things in the c_0].[end if][if c_0 is open and the c_0 contains nothing] The trunk is empty! This is the worst thing that could possibly happen, ever![end if]

There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south.

infos.name: spare room
infos.desc:
You've just walked into a spare room. Let's see what's in here.

 You can see a workbench. The workbench is standard.[if there is something on the s_2] On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_2]. You shudder, but continue examining the room.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if]

There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked.

infos.name: trunk
infos.desc: The trunk looks strong, and impossible to destroy. [if open]You can see inside it.[else if closed]You can't see inside it because the lid's in your way.[otherwise]There is a lock on it.[end if]

infos.name: salad
infos.desc: You couldn't pay me to eat that usual thing.

infos.name: insect
infos.desc: The insect appears to be well matched to everything else here

infos.name: hat
infos.desc: The hat would seem to be to fit in here

objective: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First of all, make an effort to travel north. And then, go to the east. And then, retrieve the sponge from the floor of the washroom. And then, go south. Next, place the sponge on the floor of the study. That's it!
